s1.ptxt: For 4A/T model, place select lever in “P” and apply parking brake.
For 5M/T model, place gear shift lever in “Neutral” and apply parking brake.
Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.
While listening to sound of injector (2) by using sound scope (1) or the like, increase engine speed to higher than 3,000 rpm.
Check that injector operation sound stops when throttle valve is closed instantly and it is heard again when engine speed is reduced to approx. 2,000 rpm or less.
